Verses: 1 karththarukkup Pudhuppaattaip Paadungal; Boomiyin Kudigale, Ellaarum Karththaraip Paadungal.
2 karththaraip Paadi, Avarudaiya Naamaththai Sthoththiriththu, Naalukku Naal Avarudaiya Ratchippai Suviseshamaai Ariviyungal.
3 jaadhigalukkul Avarudaiya Magimaiyaiyum, Sagala Janangalukkullum Avarudaiya Adhisayangalaiyum Vivariththu Sollungal.
4 karththar Periyavarum, Migavum Sthoththirikkappadaththakkavarumaayirukkiraar; Ellaa Dhevargalilum Bayappadaththakkavar Avare.
5 sagala Janangaludaiya Dhevargalum Vikkiragangaldhaane; Karththaro Vaanangalai Undaakkinavar.
6 magimaiyum Ganamum Avar Samugaththil Irukkiradhu, Vallamaiyum Magaththuvamum Avar Parisuththa Sthalaththilulladhu.
7 janangalin Vamsangale, Karththarukku Magimaiyaiyum Vallamaiyaiyum Seluththungal,karththarukke Adhai Seluththungal.
8 karththarukku Avarudaiya Naamaththirkuriya Magimaiyai Seluththi, Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvandhu, Avarudaiya Piraagaarangalil Piravesiyungal.
9 parisuththa Alangaaraththudane Karththaraith Thozhudhukollungal; Boologaththaare, Neengal Yaavarum Avarukku Munbaaga Nadungungal.
10 karththar Raajarigampannugiraar, Aagaiyaal Poochchakkaram Asaiyaadhapadi Urudhippattirukkum; Avar Janangalai Nidhaanamaai Niyaayantheerppaar Endru Jaadhikalukkulle Sollungal.
11 vaanangal Magizhndhu, Boomi Poorippaagi, Samuththiramum Adhin Niraivum Muzhanguvadhaaga.
12 naadum Adhilulla Yaavum Kalikooruvadhaaga; Appozhudhu Karththarukku Munbaaga Kaattu Virutchangalellaam Gembeerikkum.
13 avar Varugiraar, Avar Boomiyai Niyaayantheerkka Varugiraar; Avar Boologaththai Needhiyodum, Janangalai Saththiyaththodum Niyaayantheerppaar.
